result.execSummary:
The defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Sex Offender - Fail/Update Information, a class H felony, Wisconsin Statutes 301.45(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton and intern Josh A..  Sue Mueller and intern Rick S. appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   No Contest Plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.

Count 1:
$518.00 costs, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
90 Days in Sauk County Jail, with huber, consecutive.  Commence on or before Sept. 7, 2015 @ 7:00 pm
1 day credit
Paperwork handed in court.

Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton and intern Josh A..  Sue Mueller and intern Rick S. appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court finds probable cause, bind over for Br 2.

Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Sue Mueller and Rick S. appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Middleton advises court matter is close to resolution.  Request reset of 3 weeks.  State has no objection.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for July 10, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Atty Middleton needs time to get docs from DOC.  Requests 30 days adjournment.  Bond continued.  Return date scheduled for June 19, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn in court with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Near resolution, need some more information.  Bond continues.  Return date scheduled for May 22, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on April 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Return date on April 21, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn by video from LEC with attorney Melville Peter Middleton.  Defendant Joseph E Polkinghorn in custody.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  State requests $500 cash bond.  Atty Middleton responds/requests signature bond.  DE does qualify for PD appt.  Advised rights to an attorney.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $250.00 cash bond set.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for April 21, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
